channel.title: How to get the selling price divived by 2 of the buying price
channel.description:
Now I can sell items for the same price as I buy them,
I want the sell price divived by 2 as the buy price.
Example:
Price for buying a Steel Bar = 15.000 gp Price for selling a Steel Bar = 7.500 gp
the selling price must be divived by 2.

item.title: How to get the selling price divived by 2 of the buying price
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Find this in shopassistant.java:

c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": shop will buy for " + ShopValue + " coins" + ShopAdd);

Add this above the first line:

int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 1, removeSlot));
Replace it with this:

int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 1, removeSlot) * 0.90);

In your sellitem method find this:

TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 1, fromSlot));

Replace it with this:

TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 1, fromSlot) * 0.90);

Read full topic
item.source: How to get the selling price divived by 2 of the buying price
